attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lewis Hamilton was denied victory in a completely unfair manner. 
He cut a chicane to pass, but then relinquished his move, and then re-passed him. He gained no advantage.

This decision has caused absolute outrage and causes a black cloud over Formula 1 because of poor decisions made by the hierachy. It is time they saw just how unpopular they really are.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
